content:
"""
I see our current state:
1. We have copper plates (16) and some copper ore (40)
2. Our iron furnaces are empty
3. Our mining drill isn't on ore anymore
4. We have copper furnaces working

Let's reorganize our setup:
"""

# First, let's get our iron production back up
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)

# Move our existing drill to new iron location
drill = get_entities(set([Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill]))[0]
pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, drill.position)
place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos, direction=Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)

# Get iron ore for furnaces
harvest_resource(iron_pos, quantity=50)

# Refuel and reload iron furnaces
iron_furnaces = get_entities(set([Prototype.StoneFurnace]))[:2]
for furnace in iron_furnaces:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=20)

# Extract existing copper plates from copper furnaces
copper_furnaces = get_entities(set([Prototype.StoneFurnace]))[2:]
for furnace in copper_furnaces:
    extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, furnace.position, quantity=20)

# Add more copper ore to copper furnaces
for furnace in copper_furnaces:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)
    insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace, quantity=20)

print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print("\nCurrent setup:")
print(get_entities())

# Wait for processing
sleep(10)

print("\nAfter processing:")
print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
